title: Watch With a View - Watchface
summary: Watch With a View is a Webcam Browser Watchface for your Android Wear
description: With "Watch With a View" you can set your favorite webcam as background image of your Android Wear.Now with Wear 2.0 support!!! (Works perfect with an iPhone as well!) JPEG, MJPEG webcams and password protected IP cameras are supported.Following urls are supported:http://myurl.com/mystaticimage...http://myurl.com/mymjpegcamhttp://username:password@myurl.com/myimage...http://myurl.com/myimage?username=myuser&password=mypasswordhttp://myurl.com/myimage?user=myuser&pwd=mypasswordThis way, you can always check the wind conditions at your sailing or paragliding spots, you can check the weather and snow conditions at your favorite skiing area, or even check your security cameras at home, directly on your Android Wear, as you are checking the time. Perfect for security surveillance - have always a look at your most important things!  Watch With a View comes equipped with pre-installed webcams including live satellite images showing the Earth cloud cover from 35.000km, or NASA Blue Marble including night view. New: Including 100+ Panomax 360 Kameras (see the menu on the watchface, "Preinstalled Webcams". At this point, the pre-installed webcams are not in the menu on the companion app on the phone). You can use any image url with Watch With a View, not only webcams. MJPEG cameras look especially spectacular, when you are looking at a live video on your watch (i.e. the waves of the beach of Waikiki as shown in the movie).  Additionally, you can • choose your watch mode (12 hours, 24 hours, or analog)• set the the position of the time (middle, top) - for 12/24 watch mode.• change the update interval: from every time you look at the watch, to once an hour; or "never" in case you use a static image• fit the webcams "center", "left", "right", or "animated" (for static image webcams)• change font style and font color• save all your favorite webcams in your "Favorites" list, and switch between them right from the watch menu Moreover,• webcams are not updated when the watch is on the docking station to limit bandwidth and battery usage. Supported Devices:• Motorola Moto360• LG G WATCH R • LG G Watch• Samsung Gear LIVE • SmartWatch 3 • ASUS ZenWatch (optimized for Low-Bit Ambient Mode)• Sony 3 Android Wear• LG Watch Urbane• ... and any other smartwatches with Android Wear We support round and squared Android Wear watches. How do I determine the image URL of a specific Webcam?Open the Webcam of your choice on your Mac/PC and right click on the image of the webcam. Usually you should see the address of the image e.f. http://easy10.it-wms.com/big_current1.jpgOpen the "Android Wear" app on your Android phone and go to the Settings of "Watch With a View" and enter the URL.To save your webcam in the "Favorites" list, choose "Add current Webcam to Favorites" in the Settings menu of the "Watch With a View" Settings within the "Android Wear" app on your phone.-----SUPPORT: In case you're having problems getting the image of your password protected webcam to work on Watch With a View, send us an email at info@schneeweis.technology, and we will help you.-----Find and share Webcam URLs on the Watch With a View Google+ Community (https://plus.google.com/communities/105805748857237012543)If you have further feature requests, please don't hesitate to contact us at info@schneeweis.technology
descriptionHTML:
With "Watch With a View" you can set your favorite webcam as background image of your Android Wear.

Now with Wear 2.0 support!!! (Works perfect with an iPhone as well!)

JPEG, MJPEG webcams and password protected IP cameras are supported.

Following urls are supported:
http://myurl.com/mystaticimage...
http://myurl.com/mymjpegcam
http://username:password@myurl.com/myimage...
http://myurl.com/myimage?username=myuser&password=mypassword
http://myurl.com/myimage?user=myuser&pwd=mypassword

This way, you can always check the wind conditions at your sailing or paragliding spots, you can check the weather and snow conditions at your favorite skiing area, or even check your security cameras at home, directly on your Android Wear, as you are checking the time. Perfect for security surveillance - have always a look at your most important things!

Watch With a View comes equipped with pre-installed webcams including live satellite images showing the Earth cloud cover from 35.000km, or NASA Blue Marble including night view. New: Including 100+ Panomax 360 Kameras (see the menu on the watchface, "Preinstalled Webcams". At this point, the pre-installed webcams are not in the menu on the companion app on the phone).

You can use any image url with Watch With a View, not only webcams. MJPEG cameras look especially spectacular, when you are looking at a live video on your watch (i.e. the waves of the beach of Waikiki as shown in the movie).

Additionally, you can
• choose your watch mode (12 hours, 24 hours, or analog)
• set the the position of the time (middle, top) - for 12/24 watch mode.
• change the update interval: from every time you look at the watch, to once an hour; or "never" in case you use a static image
• fit the webcams "center", "left", "right", or "animated" (for static image webcams)
• change font style and font color
• save all your favorite webcams in your "Favorites" list, and switch between them right from the watch menu

Moreover,
• webcams are not updated when the watch is on the docking station to limit bandwidth and battery usage.

Supported Devices:
• Motorola Moto360
• LG G WATCH R
• LG G Watch
• Samsung Gear LIVE
• SmartWatch 3
• ASUS ZenWatch (optimized for Low-Bit Ambient Mode)
• Sony 3 Android Wear
• LG Watch Urbane
• ... and any other smartwatches with Android Wear

We support round and squared Android Wear watches.

How do I determine the image URL of a specific Webcam?

Open the Webcam of your choice on your Mac/PC and right click on the image of the webcam. Usually you should see the address of the image e.f. http://easy10.it-wms.com/big_current1.jpg

Open the "Android Wear" app on your Android phone and go to the Settings of "Watch With a View" and enter the URL.

To save your webcam in the "Favorites" list, choose "Add current Webcam to Favorites" in the Settings menu of the "Watch With a View" Settings within the "Android Wear" app on your phone.

-----

SUPPORT: In case you're having problems getting the image of your password protected webcam to work on Watch With a View, send us an email at info@schneeweis.technology, and we will help you.

-----

Find and share Webcam URLs on the Watch With a View Google+ Community (https://plus.google.com/communities/105805748857237012543)

If you have further feature requests, please don't hesitate to contact us at info@schneeweis.technology
comments: I have many watchfaces, but honestly, I think this is the most useful one, because it shows an up to date, unique, and always new picture of my favorite places. The Golden Gate bridge, the skiing slope close to my place, or the view from my local yacht club, I always carry these views with me!
Does what it promises Screen captures don't show it, but you are able to remove all text on the watch face in the paid version. Looks good!
I need help with this app.cannot download my local webcam

Need a little help Love the face, especially the cloud one. I have a camera at home though that is a dlink 5222l I connect to through ddns. I would like to use it but I can't get it to show up, the url pasted in from opening the image never refreshes and I don't know if it's because the camera is password protected or what. Any ideas?
Me I cant see how to get into it.  The face when i down loaded it looks lovely.  I Cant slate it as i cant  find it.   Now found it and love it
recentChanges: MJPG movies are now supported also for 2.0. Example URL: Waikiki Beach Cam http://66.175.76.125/mjpg/video.mjpg
Bug fix: Wear 1.x users might have experienced problems with the webcam resolution - this is now fixed.
This is the largest update since the first launch of this app in 2015.
Updated to latest version of Android
